mapper.select: SELECT cafe.cafe_id, cafe_name, cafe_address, IFNULL(AVG(review_rating), 0) AS avg_rating FROM cafe LEFT OUTER JOIN review ON cafe.cafe_id = review.cafe_id GROUP BY cafe.cafe_id;

SELECT cafe.cafe_id, cafe.cafe_name, cafe.cafe_address, avg(review_rating) as avg_rating FROM cafe, review WHERE review.cafe_id = cafe.cafe_id AND cafe.cafe_name LIKE ('%' #{name} '%') GROUP BY review.cafe_id;
mapper.update: UPDATE cafe SET cafe_name = #{cafeName}, cafe_address = #{cafeAddress}, cafe_phone = #{cafePhone}, cafe_introduce = #{cafeIntroduce}, cafe_reward = #{cafeReward}, cafe_rewardstamp = #{cafeRewardstamp} WHERE cafe_id = #{cafeId};
